description: yeehaa is an ecosystem architect with a PhD in Philosophy, blending academia and tech expertise. As an entrepreneur, he founded Offcourse and created the Superconnectors event format. Based in Taipei, yeehaa focuses on transforming education, knowledge sharing, and fostering inclusive internet communities. His work spans various domains, including philosophy, technology, and sustainability. yeehaa's blog posts and courses reflect his diverse interests, covering topics like ecosystem architecture, decentralization, innovation, and the intersection of nature and technology. He advocates for collaborative approaches, value pluralism, and regenerative design principles in addressing global challenges.
blurb: yeehaa: Ecosystem architect, philosopher, and tech innovator bridging academia and entrepreneurship to transform education and foster inclusive digital communities. Advocates for collaborative, value-driven approaches in addressing global challenges.
